caption.p: Prediction dengue cases in the last 24 months by the long short-term memory (LSTM) model, back propagation neural network (BPNN) model, gradient boosting machine (GBM) model, generalized additive (GAM) model, and support vector regression (SVR) model. Comparison of 24-month predictions for 2017 to 2018 in Guangzhou, Foshan, Sipsong Panna, Dehong, and Chaozhou which pose a high degree of dengue infection.
